title: FS: 6 card lot of Obaks--Price reduced/SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: 6 card lot of Obaks--Price reduced/SOLD
posts.post_content: SOLD--Hello--Selling as a lot only at this time.  The Wiggs was previously owned by Buck Barker & has some of his notes on the back.  I'm asking $195.00 for the lot (shipping included).  Paypal preferred.  Please email me at [url]jpcw1999@yahoo.com[/url].  Thanks, Jeremy
